faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.description: Everything is done by email — schedule a personalized demo and receive documentation for your team.

q1.question: Do crews need accounts or logins?
q1.answer: No account, password, or download. The QR opens a secure form scoped to that site. We automatically capture the submitter's identifier and timestamp.

q2.question: What happens with spotty connectivity?
q2.answer: ProofOnSite caches the submission locally, compresses media, then syncs as soon as the device catches signal. A banner confirms once the delivery is transmitted.

q3.question: Can we automatically notify suppliers or clients?
q3.answer: Yes. Each site lets you add optional CC emails so stakeholders receive the same log without being added as users.

q4.question: How quickly can we get started?
q4.answer: We create your QR packs and onboarding checklist within 3 business days. Pilot sites typically launch the same week.

cta.title: Schedule your site pilot
cta.description: Answer three short questions and we'll prepare a printable QR pack, adoption guide, and video onboarding session — all within 72 hours.
